# Introduction 

This vignette provides a comparison of the 12 variables selected by the 3 methods: coda_logistic_lasso, clr+logistic_lasso, selbal.

First, let us install and load the packages.

## Packages installation and loading

```{r,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#cran.packages = c('knitr','MASS','VennDiagram','gplots','glmnet')

library(knitr)
library(MASS)
library(VennDiagram)
library(gplots)
```
